title: Effect of increasing H+ conc on reaction kinetics

content.prompt:
Cl−(aq) + ClO−(aq) + 2 H+(aq) → Cl2(g) + H2O(l)

What effect will increasing [H+] at constant temperature have on the reaction represented above?

choices.label: The activation energy of the reaction will increase.
The activation energy of the reaction will decrease.
The frequency of collisions between H+(aq) ions and ClO−(aq) ions will increase.
The value of the rate constant will increase.

skill.text: 6.E: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using connections between particulate and macroscopic scales or levels.
